00023 #ifndef CURVE_H
00024 #define CURVE_H

00026 #include <gtl/gtl.hpp>
00027 #include <gtl/vec2.hpp>

00029 namespace gtl
00030 {
00036         template<typename Type>
00037         class Curve
00038         {
00039         public:
00040                 typedef enum
00041                 {
00042                         INTERPOL_LINEAR,
00043                         INTERPOL_AKIMA,
00044                         NUM_INTERPOL_TYPES
00045                 } INTERPOL_TYPES;
00046 
00048                 Curve()
00049                 {
00050                         Vec2<Type> pts[2];
00051 
00052                         m_points = NULL;
00053                         m_num_points = 0;
00054 
00055                         m_interpol_x = NULL;
00056                         m_interpol_y = NULL;
00057                         m_interpol_z = NULL;
00058                         m_interpol_t = NULL;
00059 
00060                         pts[0].x() = (Type)0.0;
00061                         pts[0].y() = (Type)0.0;
00062                         pts[1].x() = (Type)1.0;
00063                         pts[1].y() = (Type)1.0;
00064 
00065                         setPoints(pts, 2);
00066                         init_linear(pts, 2);
00067                 }
00068 
00070                 Curve(const Vec2<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00071                 {
00072                         m_points = NULL;
00073                         m_num_points = 0;
00074 
00075                         m_interpol_x = NULL;
00076                         m_interpol_y = NULL;
00077                         m_interpol_z = NULL;
00078                         m_interpol_t = NULL;
00079 
00080                         if (setPoints(pts, num_points) < 0)
00081                                 Curve();        // if setVertices fails, construct default polyhedron...
00082 
00083                         init_linear(pts, 2);
00084                 }
00085 
00088                 void set_interpol(INTERPOL_TYPES type)
00089                 {
00090                         switch(type)
00091                         {
00092                                 case INTERPOL_AKIMA:
00093                                         init_akima(m_points, m_num_points);
00094                                         break;
00095 
00096                                 case INTERPOL_LINEAR:
00097                                         init_linear(m_points, m_num_points);
00098                                         break;
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101 
00103                 virtual ~Curve()
00104                 {
00105                         if (m_points != NULL)
00106                                 delete [] m_points;
00107 
00108                         if (m_interpol_x != NULL)
00109                                 delete [] m_interpol_x;
00110 
00111                         if (m_interpol_y != NULL)
00112                                 delete [] m_interpol_y;
00113 
00114                         if (m_interpol_t != NULL)
00115                                 delete [] m_interpol_t;
00116 
00117                         if (m_interpol_z != NULL)
00118                                 delete [] m_interpol_z;
00119                 }
00120 
00122                 int setPoints(const Vec2<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00123                 {
00124                         if (m_points != NULL)
00125                                 delete [] m_points;
00126 
00127                         m_points = new Vec2<Type> [num_points];
00128                         m_num_points = num_points;
00129 
00130                         for (int i = 0; i < m_num_points; i++)
00131                         {
00132                                 m_points[i].setValue(pts[i].x(), pts[i].y());
00133                         }
00134 
00135                         set_interpol(m_current_interpol);       // re-interpolate
00136 
00137                         return 0;
00138                 }
00139 
00142                 int getPoint(Type x, Vec2<Type> &result) const
00143                 {
00144                         result.x() = x;
00145 
00146                         switch(m_current_interpol)
00147                         {
00148                                 case INTERPOL_LINEAR:
00149                                         result.y() = get_linear(x);
00150                                         return 0;
00151 
00152                                 case INTERPOL_AKIMA:
00153                                         result.y() = get_akima(x);
00154                                         return 0;
00155                         }
00156 
00157                         return -1;
00158                 }
00159 
00161                 Vec2<Type> &start()
00162                 {
00163                         Vec2<Type> *start_pt = &m_points[0];
00164 
00165                         for (int i = 1; i < m_num_points; i++)
00166                         {
00167                                 if (m_points[i].x() < start_pt->x())
00168                                 {
00169                                         start_pt = &m_points[i];
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172 
00173                         return *start_pt;
00174                 }
00175 
00177                 Vec2<Type> &end()
00178                 {
00179                         Vec2<Type> *end_pt = &m_points[0];
00180 
00181                         for (int i = 1; i < m_num_points; i++)
00182                         {
00183                                 if (m_points[i].x() > end_pt->x())
00184                                 {
00185                                         end_pt = &m_points[i];
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188 
00189                         return *end_pt;
00190                 }
00191 
00192         protected:
00193                 INTERPOL_TYPES  m_current_interpol;
00194                 Vec2<Type>      *m_points;
00195                 int             m_num_points;
00196 
00197                 double          *m_interpol_x;  // x values for the initial points
00198                 double          *m_interpol_y;  // y values for the initial points
00199                 double          *m_interpol_z;  // for akima interpolation only
00200                 double          *m_interpol_t;  // for akima interpolation only
00201 
00202                 void init_linear(const Vec2<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00203                 {
00204                     if (pts == NULL)
00205                         return;
00206                         
00207                     m_current_interpol = INTERPOL_LINEAR;
00208 
00209                     if (m_interpol_x != NULL)
00210                         delete [] m_interpol_x;
00211 
00212                     m_interpol_x = new double [num_points];
00213                         
00214                     if (m_interpol_y != NULL)
00215                         delete [] m_interpol_y;
00216 
00217                     m_interpol_y = new double [num_points];
00218 
00219                     for (int i = 0; i < num_points; ++i)
00220                     {
00221                         m_interpol_x[i] = pts[i].x();
00222                         m_interpol_y[i] = pts[i].y();
00223 
00224                         std::cout << "m_interpol_x[" << i << "] = " << pts[i].x() << std::endl;
00225                         std::cout << "m_interpol_y[" << i << "] = " << pts[i].y() << std::endl;
00226                     }
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 void init_akima(const Vec2<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00230                 {
00231                     if (pts == NULL)
00232                         return;
00233                     
00234                     m_current_interpol = INTERPOL_AKIMA;
00235 
00236                     if (m_interpol_x != NULL)
00237                         delete [] m_interpol_x;
00238 
00239                     m_interpol_x = new double [num_points];
00240                         
00241                     if (m_interpol_y != NULL)
00242                         delete [] m_interpol_y;
00243 
00244                     m_interpol_y = new double [num_points];
00245 
00246                     if (m_interpol_z != NULL)
00247                         delete [] m_interpol_z;
00248 
00249                     m_interpol_z = new double [num_points];
00250                         
00251                     if (m_interpol_t != NULL)
00252                         delete [] m_interpol_t;
00253 
00254                     m_interpol_t = new double [num_points + 3];
00255 
00256                     for (int i = 0; i < num_points; ++i)
00257                     {
00258                             m_interpol_x[i] = pts[i].x();
00259                             m_interpol_y[i] = pts[i].y();
00260                     }
00261 
00262                     for (int i = 0; i < num_points - 1; ++i)
00263                     {
00264                             m_interpol_t[i + 2] = (pts[i + 1].y() - pts[i].y()) / (pts[i + 1].x() - pts[i].x());
00265                     }
00266 
00267                     m_interpol_t[1] = (2.0 * m_interpol_t[2]) - m_interpol_t[3];
00268                     m_interpol_t[0] = (2.0 * m_interpol_t[1]) - m_interpol_t[2];
00269 
00270                     m_interpol_t[num_points + 1] = (2.0 * m_interpol_t[num_points]) - m_interpol_t[num_points - 1];
00271                     m_interpol_t[num_points + 2] = (2.0 * m_interpol_t[num_points + 1]) - m_interpol_t[num_points];
00272 
00273                     for (int i = 0; i < num_points; ++i)
00274                     {
00275                             double left = fabs(m_interpol_t[i + 1] - m_interpol_t[i]);
00276                             double right = fabs(m_interpol_t[i + 3] - m_interpol_t[i + 2]);
00277 
00278                             // check for division by zero
00279                             if (left + right != 0.0)
00280                             {
00281                                     m_interpol_z[i] = ((right * m_interpol_t[i + 1]) + (left * m_interpol_t[i + 2])) / (left + right);
00282                             } else {
00283                                     // special case
00284                                     m_interpol_z[i] = (m_interpol_t[i + 1] + m_interpol_t[i + 2]) / 2.0;
00285                             }
00286                     }
00287                 }
00288 
00289                 Type get_linear(Type x_pos) const
00290                 {
00291                         int i = 1;
00292                         double a = 0.0;
00293                         double y = 0.0;
00294                         double x = (double)x_pos;
00295 
00296                         while (x > m_interpol_x[i + 1])
00297                                 i++;
00298 
00299                         a = (x - m_interpol_x[i - 1]) / (m_interpol_x[i] - m_interpol_x[i - 1]);
00300 
00301                         y = (a * (m_interpol_y[i] - m_interpol_y[i - 1])) + m_interpol_y[i - 1];
00302 
00303                         return (Type)y;
00304                 }
00305 
00306                 Type get_akima(Type x_pos) const
00307                 {
00308                         int i = 0;
00309                         double dist_left = 0.0;
00310                         double dist_right = 0.0;
00311                         double y = 0.0;
00312                         double x = (double)x_pos;
00313 
00314                         while (x > m_interpol_x[i + 1])
00315                                 i++;
00316 
00317                         dist_right = m_interpol_x[i + 1] - m_interpol_x[i];
00318                         dist_left = x - m_interpol_x[i];
00319 
00320                         y = m_interpol_y[i] + (m_interpol_z[i] * dist_left) + (3.0 * m_interpol_t[i + 2] - 2.0 * m_interpol_z[i] - m_interpol_z[i + 1])
00321                                 * SQR(dist_left) / dist_right + (m_interpol_z[i] + m_interpol_z[i + 1] - 2.0 * m_interpol_t[i + 2]) 
00322                                 * pow(dist_left, 3.0) / SQR(dist_right);
00323 
00324                         return (Type)y;
00325                 }
00326 };
00327 
00328 typedef Curve<int>    Curvei;
00329 typedef Curve<float>  Curvef;
00330 typedef Curve<double> Curved;
00331 } // namespace gtl
